account.keep-this-token-secure-it-provides-full-: üîê Keep this token secure! It provides full access to your account.
account.are-you-sure-you-want-to-permanently-del: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
account.any-secrets-you-wish-to-remove: Any secrets you wish to remove,
account.secrets-will-remain-active-until-they-ex: Secrets will remain active until they expire.
account.are-you-sure-you-want-to-deactivate-your: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? All of your data will be permanently removed from our servers forever. This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.manage_your_account_settings_and_prefere: Manage your account settings and preferences

profile.title: Profile
profile.password-required-for-security: Your password is required for security purposes
profile.verification-email-notice: A verification email will be sent to the new address
profile.change-email-description: Update the email address associated with your account
profile.invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address
profile.email-same-as-current: New email must be different from current email
profile.email-change-success: Email updated successfully. Please check your inbox to verify your new email address.
profile.email-change-error: Failed to update email. Please try again.

delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.description: Permanently delete your account and all data
delete_account.permanently_delete_your_account: Permanently delete your account and all data

security.enable-mfa-recommendation: Enable two-factor authentication for stronger protection
security.generate-recovery-codes-recommendation: Generate recovery codes as a backup
security.use-strong-unique-password: Use a strong, unique password for your account
security.enable-mfa-for-protection: Enable two-factor authentication for additional protection
security.save-recovery-codes-safely: Save your recovery codes in a secure location
security.review-sessions-regularly: Review and revoke unused sessions regularly

api.title: API & Integrations
api.documentation-description: Learn how to integrate Onetime Secret into your applications
api.never-commit-api-keys: Never commit API keys to version control
api.use-environment-variables: Use environment variables to store API keys
api.rotate-keys-regularly: Rotate API keys regularly for security
api.use-https-only: Always use HTTPS when making API requests
api.monitor-api-usage: Monitor your API usage and set up alerts
api.regenerating-key-warning: Regenerating your API key will invalidate the current key. Update all applications using the old key.

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.explanation: This isn't a setting because there's nothing to turn on or off. Your privacy is built into how we operate.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.error-updating: Failed to update notification preference. Please try again.

reveal-notifications.title: Secret Reveal Notifications
reveal-notifications.description: Receive an email when someone views your secret
reveal-notifications.help: You'll be notified each time a recipient reveals one of your secrets

notifications.privacy-note: Notification emails include only the timestamp and secret ID. Viewer information is never included.

caution.title: Careful Consideration Zone
caution.export-description: Request a complete copy of your account data in machine-readable format
caution.export-info-description: Exports are processed within 24 hours and sent to your email address
caution.deletion-warning-metadata: Remove all secret metadata and history
